trait.name: The Black Curse
trait.description: Raised from the dead by a dark wizard Gabrius, you are cursed to walk the land for an eternity.

trait.name: Curse of Enslavement
trait.description: The dark wizard Gabrius has enslaved your mind to obey his every command.

trait.name: Novice Lumberjack
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in mastering the art of tree cutting - now go further.

<color=green> Gain Pathfinding, which increases movement speed outside of combat. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in woodsmanship by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Angler
trait.description: You've taken your first steps in unlocking the secrets of the depths - now go further.\n\n<color=green> Increases experience gains in fishing by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Swordsman
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in mastering weapon techniques - now go further.

<color=green> Slightly increases your attack speed with melee weapons. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in attack by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Rockpicker
trait.description: You've taken your first steps in mastering the art of breaking rocks - now go further.\n\n<color=green> Increases experience gains in mining by 5%.</color>

trait.name: Novice Marksman
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in mastering the art of arrowflight - now go further.

<color=green> Slightly increases your attack speed with ranged weapons. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in archery by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Spellslinger
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in unlocking the secrets of magic - now go further.

<color=green> Your base mana is increased by 5. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in sorcery by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Shieldbearer
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in mastering the art of protection - now go further.

<color=green> Your base health is increased by 5. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in defence by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Blacksmith
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in understanding the forge - now go further.

<color=green> Gain a small chance to create an exceptional quality of an equippable item while smithing. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in smithing by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Outfitter
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in understanding clothing patterns - now go further.

<color=green> Gain a small chance to create an exceptional quality of an equippable item while tailoring. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in tailoring by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Wright
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in the art of crafting unlikely things - now go further.

<color=green> Gain a small chance to create an exceptional quality of an equippable item at a crafting workbench. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in crafting by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Potioner
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in unlocking the secrets of alchemy - now go further.

<color=green> Increases the duration of your potion buffs slightly. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in alchemy by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Novice Saucemaker
trait.description:
You've taken your first steps in unlocking the secrets of soupmaking - now go further.

<color=green> Enables you to acquire local cooking recipes from taverns in Timberwell, Grainwater and Ratcliffe. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in cooking by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Lumberjack
trait.description:
You are becoming confident in the art of felling trees, but trees come in many shapes and sizes - there is much more to learn.

<color=green> The movement speed bonus from Pathfinding is increased. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in woodsmanship by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Angler
trait.description: Baiting common types of fish comes easily to you now, but there are much more elusive aquatic creatures out there.\n\n<color=green> Increases experience gains in fishing by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Swordsman
trait.description:
You strike with confidence, but the road to becoming a true Blademaster is long and arduous.

<color=green> Further increases your attack speed with melee weapons slightly. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in attack by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Rockpicker
trait.description: You now understand that breaking rocks is a simple thing, yet complete mastery of the simple thing can still take a great deal of effort.\n\n<color=green> Increases experience gains in mining by 5%.</color>

trait.name: Experienced Marksman
trait.description:
You strike your mark more often than not, but arrowflight is a tricky art to master.

<color=green> Further increases your attack speed with ranged weapons slightly. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in archery by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Spellslinger
trait.description:
Summoning magic does not feel as unfamiliar to you as it once did, but how to unlock all its limitless potential?

<color=green> Your base mana is further increased by 10 and your mana regen is increased slightly. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in sorcery by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Shieldbearer
trait.description:
The fight's not over until you go down - you're trying not to go down.

<color=green> Your base health is increased by further 5 and your health regen is increased slightly. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in defence by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Blacksmith
trait.description:
Whether in battle or otherwise, you're only as good as your gear allows you to be - you clearly aim to be better.

<color=green> Your chance to create an exceptional quality of an equippable item while smithing is increased. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in smithing by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Outfitter
trait.description:
It's important to dress well, especially more so if you're looking to cast spells.

<color=green> Your chance to create an exceptional quality of an equippable item while tailoring is increased. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in tailoring by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Wright
trait.description:
Who needs magic when you can craft things that shoot arrows or explode?

<color=green> Your chance to create an exceptional quality of an equippable item at a crafting workbench is increased. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in crafting by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Potioner
trait.description:
You can't make gold yet, but it's beginning to seem within the realm of possibility.

<color=green> Further increases the duration of your potion buffs. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in alchemy by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Experienced Saucemaker
trait.description:
Fine food can solve almost any problem, one simply must know how to prepare it.

<color=green> Enables you to acquire a local cooking recipe from the tavern in Fog's Dwindling. </color>

<color=green> Increases experience gains in cooking by 5%. </color>

trait.name: Gentleman's Measurements
trait.description: Every bone that sticks out of your undead body has been thoroughly measured in order to perfectly fit your armor on.\n\n<color=green> Increases all resistances by 3. </color>

trait.name: Clean Cuts
trait.description: Gives a slight chance to acquire extra wood when chopping a tree.

trait.name: Swift Reeling
trait.description: Gives a slight chance to acquire extra fish while fishing.

trait.name: Prospecting
trait.description: Gives a slight chance to acquire extra ore while mining.

trait.name: Hammering Techniques
trait.description: Increases your smithing XP gains slightly.

trait.name: Griffin Beakers
trait.description: Increases your alchemy XP gains slightly.

trait.name: Needling Patterns
trait.description: Increases your tailoring XP gains slightly.

trait.name: Wood Carving
trait.description: Increases your crafting XP gains slightly.

trait.name: Foraged Foods
trait.description: Increases your cooking XP gains slightly

trait.name: The Felling Hatchet
trait.description: Improves your chance to acquire extra wood when chopping a tree.

trait.name: Elaborate Baiting
trait.description: Improves your chance to acquire extra fish while fishing.

trait.name: Rock Shattering
trait.description: Improves your chance to acquire extra ore while mining.

trait.name: Quenching and Tempering
trait.description: Further slightly increases your smithing XP gains.

trait.name: Berzelius Beakers
trait.description: Further slightly increases your alchemy XP gains.

trait.name: Embroidery
trait.description: Further slightly increases your tailoring XP gains.

trait.name: Craftsmanship
trait.description: Further slightly increases your crafting XP gains.

trait.name: Basting
trait.description: Further slightly increases your cooking XP gains.

trait.name: Spell Blocking
trait.description: Increases your resistance against magical attacks.

trait.name: Arrow Deflection
trait.description: Increases your resistance against ranged attacks.

trait.name: Parrying
trait.description: Increases your resistance against melee attacks.

trait.name: Graceful Steps
trait.description: Grants a chance to temporarily increase your movement speed after killing an opponent with a melee weapon.

trait.name: Soldier's Resolve
trait.description: Grants a chance to slightly recover your health after killing an opponent with a melee weapon.

trait.name: Bloodrage
trait.description: Grants a chance to temporarily increase your melee damage after killing an opponent with a melee weapon.

trait.name: Skirmishing
trait.description: Grants a chance to temporarily increase you movement speed after landing a killing strike with a ranged weapon.

trait.name: Archer's Resolve
trait.description: Grants a chance to slightly recover your health after landing a killing strike with a ranged weapon.

trait.name: Arrow Spree
trait.description: Grants a chance to temporarily increase your ranged damage after landing a killing strike with a ranged weapon.

trait.name: Combat Channeling
trait.description: Grants a chance to slightly recover your mana after killing an opponent with a spell.

trait.name: Spirit Drain
trait.description: Grants a chance to slightly recover your health after killing an opponent with a spell.

trait.name: Empowered Casting
trait.description: Grants a chance to temporarily increase your spell damage after killing an opponent with a spell.

trait.name: Serrated Blades
trait.description: Increases your damage with melee weapons slightly.

trait.name: Blade Finesse
trait.description: Increases your accuracy with melee weapons slightly.

trait.name: Bodkin Arrowheads
trait.description: Increases your damage with ranged weapons slightly.

trait.name: Eagle Feather Fletching
trait.description: Increases your accuracy with ranged weapons slightly.

trait.name: Spell Potency
trait.description: Increases your spell damage slightly.

trait.name: Swish and Flick
trait.description: Increases your spell accuracy slightly.

trait.name: Retaliating
trait.description: Successfully blocking an attack has a chance to briefly boost your damage.

trait.name: Unyielding
trait.description: Successfully blocking an attack has a chance to recover your health slightly.

trait.name: Shield Spikes
trait.description: You have a chance to reflect a part of an incoming attack back to your opponent.

trait.name: Hardiness
trait.description: Increases all resistances +4.

trait.name: Swift Draw
trait.description: Teaches you Swift Draw; an ability that allows you to fire a ranged weapon in rapid succession.

trait.name: Quick Strike
trait.description: Teaches you Quick Strike; an ability that allows you to perform an extra attack with a melee weapon.

trait.name: Laceration
trait.description: Teaches you Lacerate; a melee attack causing your enemies to bleed.\n\nDoes not work on undead.

trait.name: Copper Refining
trait.description: Allows you to cleanse dirt and impurities from copper ore using a miner's chisel and a hammer, which helps you haul more copper.\n\nA miner's chisel can be bought from mining trainers.

trait.name: Goopy Filleting
trait.description: Learn to use a gutting knife on wild goopy, to gain a goopy fillet and additional fishing experience.\n\nA gutting knife can be bought from fishing trainers.

trait.name: Sturgeon Filleting
trait.description: Learn to use a gutting knife on Pebble Sturgeon, to gain a sturgeon fillet and additional fishing experience.\n\nA gutting knife can be bought from fishing trainers.

trait.name: The Hook and Cook
trait.description: Gain 20% additional experience in fishing when cooking fish.

trait.name: Fishfood Connoisseur
trait.description: Increases your cooking experience gains when cooking fish.

trait.name: The Splitting Axe
trait.description: Allows you to use a splitting axe on Spruce Logs, to gain additional experience and firewood.\n\nA splitting axe may be bought from woodsmanship trainers.

trait.name: Squirrel Sense
trait.description: Find twice the amount of acorns from cutting spruce and oak.

trait.name: No Splinters Wasted
trait.description: Gives you a chance to acquire firewood from chopping spruce and oak.

trait.name: Angler of the Reeds
trait.description: Gain a small chance of finding special experience boosting herbs while fishing.

trait.name: Symbiosis in Trees
trait.description: Gain a small chance of finding special experience boosting herbs from woodcutting.

trait.name: Student of Varda
trait.description: Learn a spell to temporarily enchant your melee weapon damage.

trait.name: Student of Wardane
trait.description: Learn a spell to temporarily enchant your ranged weapon damage.

trait.name: Student of Yrdan
trait.description: Learn a spell to temporarily enhance your mana regeneration.

trait.name: Bait Finder
trait.description: Unlocks the ability to dig up worms near fishing sites, which increase the rate of fishing.

trait.name: Baitready
trait.description: Find increased amounts of worms near fishing sites.

trait.name: Worm Scavenger
trait.description: You're capable of finding small amounts of worms anywhere.

trait.name: Cotton Handler
trait.description: Allows you to spool cotton together for efficient storage.\n\n<color=green>Use Cotton on another Cotton in inventory while having 3 or more to spool together.</color>

trait.name: Crippling Shot
trait.description: Teaches you Crippling Shot; a ranged attack that immobilizes your target.

trait.name: Eagle Shot
trait.description: Teaches you Eagle Shot; a ranged attack that can be performed from a great distance.

trait.name: Bull Shot
trait.description: Teaches you Bull Shot; a ranged attack that knocks your target back.

trait.name: Explosive Arrow
trait.description: Teaches you Explosive Shot; a ranged attack that damages all enemies around your target.

trait.name: Leap Attack
trait.description: Teaches you Leap Attack; an ability that let's you close the distance to your enemy using melee weapons.

trait.name: Round Attack
trait.description: Teaches you Round Attack; a melee attack damaging all enemies around you.

trait.name: Splitting Expert
trait.description: Allows you to use a splitting axe on Oak Logs, to gain additional experience and firewood.\n\nA splitting axe may be bought from woodsmanship trainers.

trait.name: Advanced Splitting
trait.description: Allows you to use a splitting axe on Willow Logs, to gain additional experience and firewood.\n\nA splitting axe may be bought from woodsmanship trainers.

trait.name: Iron Refining
trait.description: Allows you to cleanse dirt and impurities from iron ore using a miner's chisel and a hammer, which helps you haul more iron.\n\nA miner's chisel can be bought from mining trainers.

trait.name: Snapper Filleting
trait.description: Learn to use a gutting knife on Charcoal Snapper, to gain a fancy fish fillet and additional fishing experience.\n\nA gutting knife can be bought from fishing trainers.

trait.name: Bass Filleting
trait.description: Learn to use a gutting knife on Horstail Reed Bass, to gain a fancy fish fillet and additional fishing experience.\n\nA gutting knife can be bought from fishing trainers.

trait.name: Imberite Refining
trait.description: Turn Imberite Ore into Refined Mountain Ore using a miner's chisel and a hammer.

trait.name: Cypress Splitting
trait.description: Turn Highland Cypress logs into Split Highland Wood using a splitting axe.

trait.name: Lobster Splitter
trait.description: Turn Rockwater Lobsters into Chunks of Mountain Fish using a gutting knife.

trait.name: Titanite Refining
trait.description: Turn Titan's Blood Ore into Refined Mountain Ore using a miner's chisel and a hammer.

trait.name: Deadwood Splitting
trait.description: Turn Deadwood Yew logs into Split Highland Wood using a splitting axe.

trait.name: Karp Gutting
trait.description: Turn Frostmelt Karp into Chunks of Mountain Fish using a gutting knife.

trait.name: Crystal Refining
trait.description: Turn Ice Mountain Crystals into Refined Mountain Ore using a miner's chisel and a hammer.

trait.name: Winterbark Splitting
trait.description: Turn Winterbark Birch logs into Split Highland Wood using a splitting axe.

trait.name: Eel Gutting
trait.description: Turn Icewater Eel into Chunks of Mountain Fish using a gutting knife.

trait.name: Unbreakable Defence
trait.description: Grants you an ability to significantly boost your resistance against ranged and physical damage for a short period, allowing you to sustain a few powerful attacks.

trait.name: Spell Immunity
trait.description: Grants you an ability to significantly boost your resistance against magical damage for a short period, allowing you to sustain a few powerful attacks.

trait.name: Mighty Recuperation
trait.description: Regain hitpoints slightly when equipping a shield, can only occur once every 5 seconds.

trait.name: Mighty Resolve
trait.description: Gain a temporary buff to damage when equipping a shield, can only occur once every 5 seconds.

trait.name: The Blood Star
trait.description: Gives a lifestealing effect to the crimson star spell.

trait.name: Soothing Flames
trait.description: Gives a lifestealing effect to the ember spell.

trait.name: Rebound Magic
trait.description: Casting the spellscreen also deals damage to enemies in an area around you.

trait.name: Forcefields
trait.description: Casting the aegis spell also deals damage to enemies in an area around you.

trait.name: Wand Mastery
trait.description: Increases your attack speed while using wands.

trait.name: Staff Mastery
trait.description: Increases your attack speed while using staves.

trait.name: Blade Toxins
trait.description: Attacks performed using daggers have a random chance to poison your target even when without the use of a poison item.

trait.name: Coated Arrows
trait.description: Attacks performed using bows have a random chance to poison your target even when without the use of a poison item.

trait.name: Potent Concentrations
trait.description: Mana potions replenish +50% more mana.

trait.name: Omnipotions
trait.description: Mana potions also replenish +50% in health.

trait.name: Smooth Bow Handles
trait.description: Grants a movement speed increase while bows or crossbows are equipped.

trait.name: Engraved Staff Handles
trait.description: Grants a movement speed increase while staves or wands are equipped.

trait.name: Trinkets of Determination
trait.description: Gain a short movement speed and damage increase at the start of combat.

trait.name: Trinkets of Remedy
trait.description: Gain a small heal at the end of combat.

trait.name: Forge Fires
trait.description: Learn a spell that immediately turns all ore in your inventory to appropriate ingots.

trait.name: Carpentry
trait.description: Gain a chance to not deplete crafting materials when using crafting skill.

trait.name: Natural Materials
trait.description: Gain a chance to not deplete crafting materials when using tailoring skill.

trait.name: Spellweave Robes
trait.description: Gain mana when taking damage while wearing magic robes.

trait.name: Spellweave Hood
trait.description: Gain mana when taking damage while wearing magic headpiece.

trait.name: Rancher's Homecoming
trait.description: Gain a teleport spell that brings you to the Shearston Estate.

trait.name: Well Cooked
trait.description: Food buff duration increased by 33%.

trait.name: Strong Spices
trait.description: Increases health recovered from food by +1 per tick.

trait.name: Satiated
trait.description: Eating food also increases the duration of buffs gained from potions by +25%.

trait.name: Healthy Diet
trait.description: Health potions are +50% more effective while a food buff is active.

trait.name: Spiritual Diet
trait.description: Mana potions are +50% more effective while a food buff is active.

trait.name: Ambush in the Wilds
trait.description: Enemies take more damage before they're considered aggressive.

trait.name: Warrior of the Wilderness
trait.description: Increases melee accuracy in outdoor areas.

trait.name: Wizard of the Wilderness
trait.description: Increases magic accuracy in outdoor areas.

trait.name: Ranger of the Wilderness
trait.description: Increases ranged accuracy in outdoor areas.

trait.name: Gleaned Fishbones
trait.description: Food buffs gained from eating fish last an additional 33.3% longer.

trait.name: Well Gutted
trait.description: Food buffs gained from eating fish heal an additional +1 per tick.

trait.name: Confident Casting
trait.description: Your experience in casting fishing hooks is reflected in increased ranged accuracy.

trait.name: Guided Hooks
trait.description: Your experience in casting fishing hooks is reflected in increased magic accuracy.

trait.name: River Canoes
trait.description:
Unlocks a fast travel option, which can be used when standing near water:

(Right-click) using a hatchet on a log allows you to turn it into a temporary canoe, to travel to distant locations.

Higher quality wood impacts how far you can travel.

trait.name: The River Navigator
trait.description: Unlocks additional canoe fast travel destinations.\n\n<color=yellow> Requires River Canoes trait from Thornhill Crafting Trainer. </color>

trait.name: Mineral Survey
trait.description: Allows you to come across Ore Clusters that contain random variety of ores.

trait.name: Herbology
trait.description: Allows you to come across Wildgrowths outdoors that hide random herbs within.

trait.name: Grouper Filleting
trait.description: Learn to use a gutting knife on Sandstone Grouper, to gain a fancy fish fillet and additional fishing experience.\n\nA gutting knife can be bought from fishing trainers.

trait.name: Master Lumberjack
trait.description: Your axe cleaves through wood with unmatched efficiency, a reflection of years mastering the forest's rhythm and secrets.\n\n<color=green> Gain access to furniture hatchet rack, which can be bought from Thornhill woodsmanship trainer. </color>

trait.name: Master Angler
trait.description: You harmonize with the water's whispers, bringing forth bounties from its depths effortlessly.\n\n<color=green> Gain access to furniture fishing rack, which can be bought from Thornhill fishing trainer. </color>

trait.name: Master Swordsman
trait.description: You move with unparalleled grace, each slash and parry a testament to a lifetime of dedication.\n\n<color=green> +5 physical damage </color>

trait.name: Master Rockpicker
trait.description: Your discerning eye and steadfast hand unearth treasures from the earth, revealing the hidden wealth beneath the feet.\n\n<color=green> Gain access to furniture miner's toolrack, which can be bought from Thornhill mining trainer. </color>

trait.name: Master Marksman
trait.description: With every draw of the bow, your arrows fly true, a blend of ancient technique and unwavering focus that hits the mark every time.\n\n<color=green> +5 ranged damage </color>

trait.name: Master Spellslinger
trait.description: Your magic weaves through the air with potent finesse, bending reality to your will.\n\n<color=green> +5 magic damage </color>

trait.name: Master Shieldbearer
trait.description: You embody the art of turning any attack aside with seamless skill and unmatched vigilance.\n\n<color=green> +50 health </color>

trait.name: Master Blacksmith
trait.description: Your forge sings with the creation of exceptional weaponry and armor, each piece a masterpiece of craftsmanship and durability.\n\n<color=green> Gain access to furniture forge and anvil, which can be bought from Thornhill smithing trainer. </color>

trait.name: Master Tailor
trait.description: With a confident hand, you can work any fabric into a garment of unmatched power.\n\n<color=green> Gain access to furniture tailor's workbench, which can be bought from Thornhill tailoring trainer. </color>

trait.name: Master Wright
trait.description: Your hands shape and join wood with extraordinary precision, constructing objects of unparalleled refinement.\n\n<color=green> Gain access to furniture carpenter's workbench, which can be bought from Thornhill crafting trainer. </color>

trait.name: Master Potioner
trait.description: You have remarkable knowledge in turning ingredients into potent elixirs, blending the natural world with the arcane.\n\n<color=green> Gain access to furniture alchemy workbench, which can be bought from Thornhill alchemy trainer. </color>

trait.name: Master Saucemaker
trait.description: Your cooking expertise transform meals, balancing flavors to perfection with a deft touch and creative flair.\n\n<color=green> Gain access to furniture cooking stove, which can be bought from Thornhill cooking trainer. </color>

trait.name: Disengage
trait.description: Grants you an ability that knocks the target back, briefly stuns them, and then allows the attacker to leap backward.

trait.name: Druidic Amplification
trait.description: Greatly increases the healing amount of Rayneâ€™s Mending.

trait.name: Blightpowder Extract
trait.description: Unlocks Throw Blightpowder ability, whereby you throw a toxic compound upon unsuspecting enemies, which reduces any healing they receive by 40%.

trait.name: Amulet of Vesteris
trait.description: An amulet of old legends, you're told it has the ability to protect the mind of its wearer from all attempts of possession by magic.
